parameters.name: AutoDeleteExecutions
parameters.description: Specifies whether to delete the related executions when a template is deleted.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template. The name can be 1 to 200 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). It cannot start with ALIYUN, ACS, ALIBABA, or ALICLOUD.
